title: Single Unified Table ~0.94 Sklearn
description: Preprocessing/Merging People and ActivitiesThis script converts features in people and activities into integers, then merges everything into a single table. Makes it easy to drop into classifiers in Sklearn or XGBoost. Conveniently, most of the data can be easily encoded to numeric values with simple string splitting. Scored ~0.944 with Random Forest Classifier in Sklearn out of the box.
